item.description: Ok Guys, This is it! It is a New England Patriot’s Super Bowl…this is not just your average Super Bowl, this is a PATRIOTS Super Bowl…a re-match with the Giants and we will once again show NY the door! So, get on your PATS gear and come to Worcester for a fantastic time! BYOB, a dish to share and a winning attitude! The HD TV is 64 inches of viewing pleasure, you’ll want to come and stake your claim on the best viewing spot. Let Sue know if you’re coming so she can make sure they have enough seating. There will be Football Squares Pool games and other surprises!!!! Sunday, February 5th, 4pm the party starts but make sure you are there by Kick Off at 6:30 PM!!
item.name: Super Bowl Party
